title: Moroccan veal and lentil soup
ingredients: ['500g veal, cut into cubes', '1/2 (400g) tin chickpeas, rinsed and drained', '300g lentils, sorted and rinsed', '2 onions, minced', '1 garlic clove, minced', '2 carrots, diced', '650g tomatoes, diced', '1 red pepper, diced', '50g fresh parsley, chopped', '50g fresh coriander, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste']
